summary: Borderlands is a 2024 American movie based on a video game. It stars Cate Blanchett as an outlaw who teams up with a group of unusual characters to find a missing person. The film was directed by Eli Roth and written by Craig Mazin and Joe Crombie. It was made by Lionsgate Films and produced by several people, including Ari and Avi Arad. The movie was filmed in Budapest, Hungary, during the COVID-19 pandemic and had reshoots directed by Tim Miller. Borderlands premiered in August 2024 and received negative reviews, only making $33 million against its $110â€“120 million cost.
title: Borderlands (film)
